comment: The way the class was organized made this class very confusing. The class was a 7 week course but the professor wasnt aware of this so crammed our class format for an entire semester into 7 weeks leaving the information on the syllabus and on d2l inaccurate. I feel as if more effort into reorganizing the course wouldve been helpful, nice professor.

Mandy is the sweetest teacher! Gives really good feedback throughout the entire semester. Very easy class if you just do the readings and they really aren't that long. Definitely recommend taking her class!!

I was worried how online courses would be at KSU but Mandy makes her entire class fascinating and fun to participate in. She is very caring and accommodating for her students, and is easy to get in touch with. The textbook is actually fun to read and classwork mostly consists of weekly discussion posts and a few projects.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Online Savvy

comment: Love her. Super clear expectations with work and grading. Weekly assignments that are manageable. Always responds to emails. Super sweet. Understands that as a student you have other classes and are stressed. Great feedback on discussion posts and essays. Even being an online class, took time to get to know every student. TAKE HER!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Super kind professor and an overall great class. Lots of help and fun times. would take again

LDRS 2300: I'm genuinely going to miss mandy and our class. By halfway through the semester, this was the only class I would attend, and it was because of her teaching. She created such a comfortable environment and class felt like we were hanging out and talking about the material rather than just being lectured at. Take her if you get the chance!
LDRS Class- She is so sweet and cares so much. Very flexible class overall 10/10 recommend

She is an awesome professor to take! I loved her class. She is very open to helping and giving feedback. She truly wants the best for her students and is very understanding, especially when it comes to due dates. She tries to make the class enjoyable and structured her class very well. Take her if you get the opportunity!

Mandy is so sweet and a great option for a gen ed culture class! The class has 15 discussions and 15 quizzes, which aren't bad at all. 2 papers, and the 2nd paper is the final project. You get a ton of help with the project by her breaking the paper down into multiple assignments. She is so caring and willing to work with you if you're stressed!
She is just amazing. def take her! discussion board and quizzes every week and a few papers
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Participation matters--So many papers

comment: I love Mandy!!! Shes awesome, funny, and made the class fun at all times. Definitely would take again!!

There are a lot of assignments, but she also gives extra credit and drops a few grades so getting an A is not hard. There is a lot of reading and writing, but most of it is interesting and she grades writing by how much you're improving. Some people in class didn't like her, but it is an enjoyable class if you participate and have an open mind.

Mandy is honestly amazing. I loved all of the topics we covered and she will really try and help you if you are having trouble. A lot of papers, but no more than 3 pages. Our final was optional. This class was part of what  inspired me to minor in American Studies.

Mandy is the best! If you participate in discussions, do your homework you will get an A for sure! She explains everything in detail and there are not tests. There are 11 quizzes (1 gets dropped), a big project, 2 group projects and a paper. She is a very caring Professor and loves discussions so if you speak up will be liked.

Mandy was the best teacher i had this semester. IF you have the chance to take her class you should because you will not regret it. You have 11 quizzes with one being dropped. Also a couple group project that are extremely easy and can be done the night before they are do. Also no test or final. Her lectures are actually fun unlike other classes.

She is extremely nice. There are no tests in this class but you do alot of group work. There is 1 major project and 11 quizzes. Attendance is mandatory too but overall I found this class to be an easy A.

NO tests at all! you have a "pop quiz" once a week on the readings that are assigned. What I mean by "pop quiz" is you know that there will be one you just dont know which day (sometimes it's an attendance quiz so automatic 100). She also gets rid of three lowest quiz grades.  She has some creative assignments although time consuming.

Mandy is great. She is super sweet, extremely willing to help, and very interactive. As long as you show up to class and participate, you're golden. She great with advice and any help you need. The class is tougher with the work sometimes, but as long is you go to class and ask questions, you'll be fine.
Mandi was super helpful and a fun teacher to have. Some of the readings are hard to understand but the discussions are open and interesting to have.

Mandy was such a cool teacher. She was really laid back, but her tests are a little tough. Other than that, she gives 2 big projects but you're in groups. Overall, I LOVED her class & this professor!!! I highly suggest taking this course

This is the best class I have taken at this school. Mandy is so sweet and helpful, not to mention how funny she is. If you want to actually get something out of an otherwise pointless class, take her. She makes the course worth it! So fun!!

Mandy is seriously the greatest professor at KSU. Not only is she so sweet but also very understanding and easy to get along with. The course work is easy and Mandy makes sure you understand it. She is outgoing and fun and never fails to make your day better. As a freshmen this is a mandatory class, and I suggest you take it with her. :)
Ms. Mandy was a AWESOME teacher! SUPER easy class, barely had any homework, she's very down to earth, loves to talk to her students. If you study a little bit you should make a very high A
Very sweet lady. You have to take this class anyway so you might as well take her. She is fun and is very clear on things to do and helps out a lot. Take her or you'll regret it
